kpi.name: M16B2C21

kpi_info.title: Call attempts terminated in an error in the home exchange (OUT)
kpi_info.use: Number of failed call attempts (0...65535) terminated in an error in the home exchange, clear codes 400...7FF.The field is updated when the first released circuit is released.

kpi.kpi_alias: Call attempts terminated in an error in the home exchange (OUT)
